## Filter data by species

```{ojs}
//| echo: false

viewof sp = Inputs.radio(
  ["Adelie", "Gentoo", "Chinstrap"],
  {
    value: "Adelie",
    label: "Species:",
  }
);

```

```{pyodide}
#| input:
#|   - sp

filtered_df_species = penguins[penguins['species'] == sp]

ax = sns.scatterplot(
    filtered_df_species,
    x="bill_length_mm",
    y="bill_depth_mm",
    hue="sex"
)

ax.set_title(sp)

plt.show()
```
